title: gAndhiyai pOTruvOmE
sahitya:
IDEra vazhi sollayyA (ayyA) (murugayyA) IrAru kaiyA ezhil vEl kumarayyA


anupallavi

  IDErum illAda iraisaTTi maganE intamizh vANar tam idayam pugum guhanE


caraNam    mAyaiyilE uzhanru nILa ariyAmal mALan iLaitta tiru aruNagiriyArai
tUyanin tiruvaDikku ALAkki vazhi kATTi summA iru sollara enrurai seidavanE
